Class UsePartPopupController

java.lang.Object
com.rocketshipcheckingtool.ui.roles.technician.UsePartPopupController
public class UsePartPopupController extends Object
Controller class for managing the popup window for using parts. Handles user input, validation, and interaction logic for using parts from inventory.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller and sets up the UI components. Configures the buttons and sets the default quantity.

    • getQuantity

      public int getQuantity()
      Retrieves the current quantity of the part to be used.
      Returns:
      The current quantity.

    • setPrice

      public void setPrice(String price)
      Sets the price label and updates the total price.
      Parameters:
      price - The price of a single part as a string.

    • setPart

      public void setPart(String part)
      Sets the part label to display the part name.
      Parameters:
      part - The name of the part.

    • setMaxQuantity

      public void setMaxQuantity(int maxQuantity)
      Sets the maximum quantity of the part that can be used.
      Parameters:
      maxQuantity - The maximum quantity.

    • getIsVerwendenButton

      public boolean getIsVerwendenButton()
      Checks if the use button was clicked.
      Returns:
      True if the use button was clicked, false otherwise.
